metadata.name: The Three Stooges
metadata.description: Everyone's favorite funny men are back in the first comic book series to use actual actor likenesses!  Larry, Moe, and Curly are up their unique brank of Stoogeness and delivering classic laughs to new generations of fans.  Come see what today's best comic book artists and writers have to say about how the Stooges influenced them and enjoy the silliness.
